plug-in init code is not nearly paranoid enough.)

Looks like problem was caused by my failed upgrade to I20040304. Deleting
.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.team.ui/syncParticipants.xml fixed the problem.

We'll leave this open as a reminder to ensure that the sync view recovers from 
bad participants. It's OK if the user needs to restart to get the sync view 
working and populated but we shouldn't require them to delete the file (i.e. 
the bad particpant should be cleared from the file on failure to load).

Fixed. Testing the following failure cases:
1. invalid class in manifest file definition of a participant
2. participant constructor fails
3. invalid participant id in persisted settings.
